title: Energy: less is more. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Thomas Smith, Robert Churchill and Churchill Films
brief_description: Looks at various ways to make more efficient use of the world’s dwindling supplies of fossil fuels: transportation systems, industrial applications, and building construction. Includes a case study of energy conservation in Davis County, California.
creator_credit_for_label: Thomas Smith, Robert Churchill and Churchill Films
